    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • search

        void search(java.lang.String query,
          java.util.List<FL_PropertyMatchDescriptor> terms,
          long start,
          long max,
          org.apache.avro.ipc.Callback<FL_SearchResults> callback)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a set of Entity search results based on the query (if provides) AND all matching terms (if any). Partial matches are allowed, but should be ranked lower. Service URL: /entity/search HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        query - text query (Solr-like syntax)
        terms - Property Search Terms
        start - 0-based index of first result to return
        max - maximum number of results to return
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDescriptors

        void getDescriptors(org.apache.avro.ipc.Callback<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FL_PropertyDescriptor>>> callback)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the property descriptors that can be used for a Search. This is normally used to populate the Advanced Search UI, providing a list of various sub-sets of the data (by type) and the valid search options for each. Service URL: /entity/descriptors HTTP Method: GET
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
